page.title: 14INFORMATION SYSTEMS
page.content: {Eastern Library Bitterne}is well used. About sixteen thousand books are taken out weekly.More unemployed are using the library now.All ages use the library but people in their teens and early twenties use the library least. The new precinct has made a difference to the use of the library.Older people found difficulty in using the library when the precinct and the bypass were being built because the library was on the other side of the main road.Now the roads and precinct have been built,more people are using the library again. People come to the library for information on local and national events as well as to borrow books.There are plenty of reference books.I am{Joan Slater}and I belong to this public library.I am fussy about the books I read but this library always has a very good selection.
